ModMetaData.name: Hydroponics Solied
ModMetaData.author: FireFoX
ModMetaData.description:
Mod Version: 1.0.0
Not sure how dependencies work. Contains two new images replacing the normal and VG Tools' advanced hydrophonics basins with ones that actually has some soil in it as I hate that the plants are just hanging in the air. No clue what happens when VG is not there.
